About Me

BIO

I have followed a thorny path to the cherished goal of becoming a Full Stack Web Developer. But each of the stages gave me some useful skills. I have learnt to programme in a boot camp, where teachers with the help of HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript and many other technologies have opened for me an amazing world where the programmer, like an artist, is becoming the creator of great masterpieces.
